ORDER CANCELLATION POLICY

Tria Packaging Solutions - Order Cancellation Policy

Effective Date: October 1, 2025

1. CANCELLATION WINDOW
You may cancel your order under the following conditions:

BEFORE PRODUCTION:
- Orders can be cancelled free of charge before production begins
- Production typically starts within 24-48 hours of order confirmation
- Contact us immediately if you need to cancel

DURING PRODUCTION:
- Cancellation may incur a 25% restocking fee
- Custom orders cannot be cancelled once production has started
- Standard items may be cancelled with fees

AFTER SHIPMENT:
- Once shipped, orders cannot be cancelled
- You may refuse delivery and request a refund (subject to refund policy)

2. HOW TO CANCEL
To cancel an order:
a) Email: support@triapackaging.com with subject "Order Cancellation - [Order Number]"
b) Phone: +65 6234 5678 during business hours
c) WhatsApp: +65 9123 4567 (fastest response)
d) Provide order number and reason for cancellation

3. CANCELLATION PROCESSING TIME
- Immediate confirmation: If before production
- 1-2 business days: If during production (pending review)
- Refund processing: 5-7 business days after cancellation approval

4. URGENT ORDERS
Orders marked as "urgent" or "rush":
- Cannot be cancelled once confirmed
- Production begins immediately
- Please confirm details carefully before placing urgent orders

5. BULK ORDERS
Orders exceeding $5,000 SGD:
- Require 24-hour cancellation notice
- May be subject to custom cancellation terms
- Contact account manager for bulk order cancellations

6. EXCEPTIONS
Cannot be cancelled:
- Custom-printed packaging with logos
- Special material orders
- Items already in transit
- Orders older than 7 days

For cancellation inquiries:
Email: support@triapackaging.com
Phone: +65 6234 5678
WhatsApp: +65 9123 4567
Business Hours: Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM SGT
